header.title: UTM builder of enterprise level
header.text: WooCommerce is a customizable, open-source eCommerce platform built on WordPress.Get started quickly and make your way.

about.title: About
about.text: UTM parameters help funnel-based analytical systems such as Google Analytics to know where your visitors are coming from.In the following form you can generate UTM links for your campaign.

about-us.p1: For more comprehensive features we offer our services.
about-us.p2: We help you to build and synchronize UTMs as well as UTM templates (?) in between your departments. This will make tracking and sharing your UTMs across your entire marketing team easy. Also you will track much more accurate campaign data and analyze the performance of content across the web.
about-us.p3: Instead of using messy spreadsheets and reentering the same details, you will have a tool that will help you get good campaign data in your analytics.
